import React, {useState} from 'react' const Login = () => { let [user, setUser] = useState({}) const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { let fieldValue = e.target.value setUser({ ...user, [field]: fieldValue }) } const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() userApi.doSave(user) .then(response => response.data) .then(user => { history.push('/login') }) } return (
handleChangeEvent(e, 'email')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'password')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'name')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'mobile')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'dob')} />

handleChangeEvent(e, 'gender')} /> Male   handleChangeEvent(e, 'gender')} /> Female
) } export default Login;
